name: The GBT Ammonia Survey (GAS)
body:
A survey of ammonia emission in nearby Gould Belt star forming regions using the [Green Bank Telescope](https://science.nrao.edu/facilities/gbt).

PIs: Rachel Friesen (@rfriesen) and Jaime Pineda (@jpinedaf) 

Survey team members: Felipe Alves, Hector Arce, Paola Caselli, Ana Chacon-Tanarro, How-Huan Chen, Michael Chen, James Di Francesco, Adam Ginsburg (@keflavich), Alyssa Goodman, Fabian Heitsch, Jared Keown, Helen Kirk, Peter Martin, Christopher Matzner, Philip Myers, Stella Offner, Anna Punanova, Erik Rosolowsky (@low-sky), Scott Schnee, Youngmin Seo, Yancy Shirley
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
